page.title: 18FLORA AND FAUNA
page.content:
There are many species of rare plants and shy birds and animals in the area, and any visitor interested in such should contact THE ROYAL SOCIETY FOR THE PROTECTION OF BIRDS. They have a representative living locally and he is a mine of information on the area.
The RSPB are very active along the river valley - planting trees and selecting parts as conservation areas.
Active walkers and weekend strollers can all get much pleasure from exploring the fells which are open to walkers obeying the Country Code especially where sheep are concerned.
